name: ROBLOX : Transparency V2
description: Theme is being revamped and optimised! I've decided to not discontinue the theme, just remake it better. Theme developed by FCEFEAR. ROBLOX Transparency theme. Makes the page semi-transparent and when used with the Non-Mobile ROBLOX extension will allow for an easier to use ROBLOX website. Please make sure to update this regularly for the best experience. Install this ROBLOX extension and enable the userbar feature for the best experience.

user.name: FCEFEAR
user.about: I never thought I'd want to learn how to code in CSS but I began to use Reddit a lot more and started doing CSS over there for various subreddits. Then I discovered Stylish and learnt much more about the language. Check out my themes, I hope you like them. If you have any requests the quickest way to contact me is through my reddit /u/FCEFEAR or my ROBLOX account, FCEFEAR.
